sentences.sContent: Because the battery is colloidal solid, so the electrolyte concentration, there is no acid layer phenomenon.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because the battery is colloidal solid, so the electrolyte concentration, there is no acid layer phenomenon.
sentences.sCn: 由于电池为胶状固体，所以电解质浓度均匀，不存在酸分层现象。

sentences.sContent: A lithium polymer battery is a type of lithium ion battery. Generally, the main difference is lithium ion polymer batteries contain a polymer electrolyte.
sentences.sContent_eng: A lithium polymer battery is a type of lithium ion battery. Generally, the main difference is lithium ion polymer batteries contain a polymer electrolyte.
sentences.sCn: 锂聚合物电池是锂离子电池的一种。一般来说，主要的区别是锂离子聚合物电池含有某种聚合物电解质。

phrases.pCn: 蓄电池电解质；电池电解液

words.tran: 电解的；电解质的；由电解产生的
[化学] 电解，[化学] 电解作用；以电针除痣

trans.tranOther: a liquid that allows electricity to pass through it
